comments: I think that for a thesis it is important to make sure you are on the right track and this class does a very good job of that.
Stephanie has always been very helpful throughout my thesis writing process! And I really appreciate her patience and empathy toward me and other thesis writers.

Writing a research paper is challenging. There are complications every step of the way. Ec985 is designed to save you from yourself--without deadlines, it would be possible to research your topic endlessly and not actually start writing.
The guidance I have received from my formal adviser has been insufficient. Make use of all available resources and informal advisers.
